Flow.description: GTMS-20576/GTMS-20578/GTMS-20579/GTMS-20575/GTMS-22786 Added Contact End date to the Active Contract check on 12/26/24 GTMS-28072: Added logic to auto Deny PR if Oppty already has CR with same partner and program GTMS-28127: Gave edit option for Partner Influence Details section for Open and Amendment oppty selection. GTMS-28680: Added boolean variable to make true if AE outcome is new Amendment oppty and passing it to Create Channel Relationship flow. GTMS-29220: Updated AE Outcome logic, For New Amendment Oppty creation AE Outcome is Amendment Opportunity and selecting existing Amendment Opportunity AE Outcome is Matched Opportunity.

fields.name: PartnerRegistrationCustomerInfo
fields.fieldText:
Channel Partner Details


  • Partner Name: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Partner_Account__r.Name}
  • Sales Program Type: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Partner_Program_Tier__c}
  • Partner Account Status: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Partner_Account_Status__c}


End Customer Details


  • End Customer Name: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Account__r.Name}
  • Business Unit: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Business_Unit__c}
  • Segment: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Fleet_Segment__c}
  • Geography: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Geography__c}
  • Contact: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Contact__r.FirstName} {!currentPartnerRegistration.Contact__r.LastName}

Sales Program Type: {!currentPartnerRegistration.Sales_Program_Type__c}

fields.name: Select_AE_Option_2
fields.fieldText: Please approve or deny based on the BANT context of the submission and the partner's engagement. On the next screen, you'll select if a new opportunity should be created or this Deal Registration should merge to an existing one.

fields.name: IMP_Message_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: IMPORTANT: If you are considering creating a new opportunity from this Partner Deal Registration, do not create a new opportunity outside of the workflow on the next screen. This impacts a partner's eligibility for paid compensation

fields.name: Denial_Reason
fields.fieldText: Denial Reason

fields.name: AE_Review_Notes
fields.fieldText: AE Review Notes

fields.name: AEDeniedMesssage
fields.fieldText: Channel Relationship is already exits on opportunity with same Partner and Program. As such, this Deal Reg has been denied.

fields.name: displayasyncmessage
fields.fieldText: The Amendment is been created in the background due to large volume of products on the existing Opportunity.
